</xs:simpleType> <xs:attribute name="FactoryType" type="xs:QName"/> <xs:attribute name="Id" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:attribute name="Ref" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: SimpleReferral
